subject: Rajasthan History
question_en: Which of the following kings is associated with the construction of Mehrangarh Fort?
question_hi: मेरंगरखंड के बाहूंकर किस राज्य का संस्करण किया गया है?
explanation_en: Maharana Fateh Singh is associated with the construction of Mehrangarh Fort. It was built by him in the 1458 AD.
explanation_hi: महारांना फेटें सिंह ये मेरांगार की बनी है। उन्हें यही बनी है। 1458 AD में यही बन गई।

subject: Rajput Rajas
question_en: Who was the founder of Kachhavi?
question_hi: कचवीं की संतुलन कौन सीत बना गीती।
explanation_en: Prince Rana Kumbha is credited with the establishment of Chittor Fort.
